name: Cataclysmic
description:
An adorable platformer game where you are a grumpy kitty being tormented by over-affectionate doggos. Shoot them & destroy their house with your Fish-Cannon-3000. Made in under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

How To:
Move with W,A,S,D
Shoot with Space

People who made this game pawsible:
Deniz Cakmaz - Game Design & Programming
Chumposaur - Programming
Chris Comb - Sound and Music
Aezylhazel - Art & Animation
